title: Chemical Hearts
description: When a hopelessly romantic high school senior falls for a mysterious new classmate, it sets them both on an unexpected journey that teaches them about love, loss, and most importantly themselves.

reviews.text: It may not have a cheerful tone like the vast majority of films of its kind, but beyond that, its narrative structure is weak, slow and irrelevant.

Chemical Hearts is not that cliché teen film, it is much more than that. It addresses subjects that are often difficult to have in youth films. It shows the reality, it conveys the message that not everything is perfect, that we cannot change anyone, however much we love them. It shows insecurity, fear, love, the difficulties of being young. I absolutely loved the movie. Lili Reinhart performed perfectly well I was absolutely speechless!
Im 14 and this is deep movie about a girl and an ****It was very cringy from 10 to the last minute. The guy did well in keeping the same face all the movie. One point for multicolored credits
Nothing interesting about this.  It's all been seen before and done better.  Amazon Studios continues producing film school projects.
mlhor filme que já assisti perfeito sério super recomendo,tem drama,tem romance tem tudo é um turbilhão de emoções esse filme simplesmente maravilhoso
Bela atuação, roteiro bem escrito, atores maravilhosos.Um filme que realmente vale a pena assistir e se emocionar!
Eu sou rendida pela Lili, assistir um filme produzido por ela me deixou muito feliz. Ela se dedicou e entregou totalmente ao filme! Um dos melhores que já vi em toda minha vida ❤
This film is perfect, Very faithful to the book,  great performance, the development of the story and very good, I thought there was a little more detail
Chemical hearts is amazing is one of the best movie I've ever watched Austin and Lili were so good in the movie both are very good actors
Absolutely amazing. The performances were incredible I felt what they were feeling. This movie made me feel less alone as a teenager knowing I’m not the only one going through this

Es una película de adolescentes, para algunos un tanto cliché o lo de siempre pero realmente si tratas de entender a los personajes sus historias y sentimientos te parecerá una película tan real y bella, emociones buenas y malas talves sentirás , la película es asombrosa.
I love this movie , is amazing ❤️Eu amo esse filme , ele é maravilhoso A atuação de anbos está perfeito é incrível toda a história e estou muito feliz com esse filme
one of the best movies i've ever watched. i loved it. congratulations everyone for the great work.
i love thus film so much. lili reinhart is so perfect.austin adam is also amazing at this
One of the best movies I've ever seen in my life! There's a lot of lessons that everyone needs to know!
Amei o filme,atuação 10/10,condiz com o livro e mostra a realidade de ser um jovem,que nem toda história tem um final feliz
Filme impecável. A atuação da Lili Reinhart estava incrível, principalmente na cena do viveiro de peixes. Filme nota 10!!!
O filme superou minhas espectativas,com a profundidade e boa atuação de Lili Renhart e Austin, vale apena ver
Chemical hearts was literally awesome, I highly recommend it and Lili Reinhart’s acting was perfect.
the way the scene grace is running killed me is different, I love this so much, the actors were amazing, the storie of the movie. It’s so similar if you read the book, it’s just amazing

This is an amazing, deep, immersive film. The atmosphere of the film captures from the first minutes. You dive deep into the characters and try to understand how they feel. The character stories are exciting. The themes raised in the film are very important. The actors portrayed their characters perfectly.  I really liked the way Lili portrayed her character.
Lili Reinhart is a proverbial force to be reckoned with. She and Austin Abrams bring light to the challenge of love, trauma, and being a kid.

it was not your typical teenage love story it wad somehow true to life like the boy did not end up with the girl. Also it shows how someone was doing with grief and their mental health which is rarely snhoen in shows and movie.
I loved the way the story is built. It is an incredible romance film, with a "deep" plot. I found it totally promising!
loved the way the story is built. It is an incredible romance film, with a deep plot. I found it totally promising.Reinhart’s acting was perfect.The actors portrayed their characters perfectly.
This movie is awesome it takes into very good love and it is one of the best movie I've watched ❤❤❤❤
